# About this recipe

## Features:
- ✅ Sign-up / Sign-in with third party providers (Like google, facebook etc..)
- ✅ Secure session management
- ✅ Email verification

## Demo App
### View the demo app
[Click here](https://thirdparty.demo.supertokens.io/) to visit the demo app
### View the source code for the demo app
[Click here](https://github.com/supertokens/supertokens-demo-react/tree/thirdparty) to view the source code for the demo app

:::important
For framework specific implementation (like Next.js), please skip the Quick setup section and go directly to the section with the name of your framework.
:::
